Class: FlyText

component/FlyText~ FlyText

new FlyText(textopt, fontSizeopt, fontFamilyopt, widthopt, heightopt, coloropt, speedopt)

Moving Text display. It creates an invisible "bounding box" around the Text to limit and break lines using the parameters width and height, displaying characters on by one, by the rate of the speed parameter.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
text String <optional>
 String containing the text to be displayed
fontSize String <optional>
 Font size in pixels
fontFamily String <optional>
 Font family name
width Number <optional>
 Width in pixels for the area containing the text.
height Number <optional>
 Height in pixels for the area containing the text.
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
speed Number <optional>
 Interval in milliseconds between each character to be displayed.
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 8

Members

finished :Boolean

Flag to point if the component has finished drawing all characters.
Type:
  • Boolean
Default Value:
  • false
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 67

speed :Number

Interval in milliseconds between each character to be displayed.
Type:
  • Number
Default Value:
  • 30

  • component/FlyText.js, line 35

startTime :Number

Time that the component started displaying the text.
Type:
  • Number
Default Value:
  • 0

textBuffer :String

Buffer used to display part of the text.
Type:
  • String
Default Value:
  • ''

Methods

clearBuffer()

Clears the internal buffer for repaint.
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 110

createTexture()

Create the texture buffer based on canvas, and attach it to the component material and mesh for rendering.
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 163

onLoad()

Callback function, triggered by the engine
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 151

renderIntoBuffer()

Renders the text with properties defined into the internal buffer texture, NOT on the screen. It is rendered on screen only during the SceneManager render cycle.
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 224

reset(textopt, fontSizeopt, fontFamilyopt, widthopt, heightopt, coloropt, speedopt)

Sets various properties of the font then re-parses for proper buffering.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
text String <optional>
 Text to be displayed
fontSize Number <optional>
 Font size, in pixels
fontFamily String <optional>
 Font-Family, accepts web fonts
width Number <optional>
 Buffer width, in pixels
height Number <optional>
 Buffer height, in pixels
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
speed Number <optional>
 Interval in milliseconds between each character to be displayed.
Source:
  • component/FlyText.js, line 80

update()

Heartbeat to update the characters displayed based on time.
When finished, flags it on the component.
